name: The crown of the liches
data: It increases the users intelligence nicely.
It has weak armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'sense weakness'.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'stunning force'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'sensory overload'.
It gives small bonus to the spell 'death wish'.
